name: Charge Gouble
description:
This project was created for my dissertation project, through further testing and reviews I have noticed a few technical bugs that are currently being sorted for the game and will be patched in due course. As well as this I am going to be adding to the experience this game gives to further flesh out the game loop allowing for more user interaction and more activities to do within the game to show more of my skills. 

I hope you enjoy playing the current version and any constructive feedback is always welcome. 

Nicholas.
